characters.name: Alexander Blackwood
characters.background: Alexander was born into a wealthy family with a long history of power and influence. He has always felt the weight of his family's expectations on his shoulders.
characters.personality: Determined, ambitious, and fiercely loyal to those he cares about.
characters.goal: To protect his kingdom from threats both within and without.

characters.name: Eira Shadowglow
characters.background: Eira was once a member of an ancient order of warriors. She has been on her own for years, taking on various quests and missions to survive.
characters.goal: To find a new purpose in life after leaving the Order.

characters.name: Arin the Unyielding
characters.background: Arin was once a renowned strategist and advisor to a kingdom. He has since gone into exile, seeking redemption for past mistakes.
characters.personality: Wise, analytical, and fiercely protective of those he cares about.
characters.goal: To make amends for past wrongs and find forgiveness.
